name: Rising Seas
description:
The message of this game: 
This game addresses the rising sea levels that we notice today and you may have heard of. The rising sea levels must be taken seriously, and both you and I can help bring it to people's views. Just inform everyone you know about the rising sea levels and we can spread the word about the rising sea levels. Thank you and enjoy!

This took over 20 hours to make, so maybe leave a love and fave? 

MAKE SURE YOU WATCH OUT FOR THE RISING SEA, IT WILL KILL YOU!!!!

CONTROLS:
- Arrow keys (computer/PC) or click in the direction you want to go (mobile)
- "S" key to skip a level
"R" to reset a level
- You can toggle some of the controls using the drop-down menu at the top of the screen that says "Options"
- Fun Fact: The love and fave buttons turn red and yellow when you click them. Try it, it actually works!
